front.title: Source Address Validation in Intra-domain Networks (Intra-domain SAVNET) Gap Analysis, Problem Statement and Requirements

abstract.t: Source Address Validation in Intra-domain Networks (Intra-domain SAVNET) aims to make improvements to existing intra-domain Source Address Validation (SAV). This document provides the gap analysis of existing intra-domain SAV mechanisms, describes the fundamental problems, and defines the requirements for improvements.
